thread.title: Halloween: Britain's most haunted stately homes
thread.title_full: Halloween: Britain's most haunted stately homes

author: Telegraph Staff
title: Halloween: Britain's most haunted stately homes
text:
MORE... 
Blickling Hall, Norfolk 
Don't venture near Blickling Hall, the former home of Anne Boleyn's family, on May 19 - Henry VIII's ill-fated second wife is said to appear every year there on the anniversary of her execution, with her head in her lap, in a coach driven by a headless rider. As if that wasn't enough, her guilt-ridden father is said to stalk the halls, as is the ghost of Sir John Fastolf - the knight who Shakespeareâ€™s Falstaff was based on. Picture: Alamy
